doc.identity: Unknown to the general populace of Earth as Kiwi Black
doc.knownrelatives: Azazel (father), Mystique (stepmother), Abyss (paternal half-brother), Nightcrawler (paternal half-brother), many other siblings (deceased)
doc.powers: Kiwi possessed the power of teleportation and he had the power to shield his mind from those possessing the ability of telepathy.
